33
34#ifdef NOT_HAVE_SOCKLEN_T
35typedef unsigned int socklen_t;
36#endif
37
38// Bind a UDP socket to find the source address to a destination
39mDNSexport void mDNSPlatformSourceAddrForDest(mDNSAddr *const src, const mDNSAddr *const dst)
40{
41 union { struct sockaddr s; struct sockaddr_in a4; struct sockaddr_in6 a6; } addr;
42 socklen_t len = sizeof(addr);
43 socklen_t inner_len = 0;
44 int sock = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
45 src->type = mDNSAddrType_None;
46 if (sock == -1) return;
47 memset(&addr, 0, sizeof(addr));
48 if (dst->type == mDNSAddrType_IPv4)
49 {
50 inner_len = sizeof(addr.a4);
51 #ifndef NOT_HAVE_SA_LEN
52 addr.a4.sin_len = inner_len;
53 #endif
54 addr.a4.sin_family = AF_INET;
55 addr.a4.sin_port = 1; // Not important, any port will do
56 addr.a4.sin_addr.s_addr = dst->ip.v4.NotAnInteger;
57 }
58 else if (dst->type == mDNSAddrType_IPv6)
59 {
60 inner_len = sizeof(addr.a6);
61 #ifndef NOT_HAVE_SA_LEN
62 addr.a6.sin6_len = inner_len;
63 #endif
64 addr.a6.sin6_family = AF_INET6;
65 addr.a6.sin6_flowinfo = 0;
66 addr.a6.sin6_port = 1; // Not important, any port will do
67 addr.a6.sin6_addr = *(struct in6_addr*)&dst->ip.v6;
68 addr.a6.sin6_scope_id = 0;
69 }
70 else return;
71
72 if ((connect(sock, &addr.s, inner_len)) < 0)
73 { LogMsg("mDNSPlatformSourceAddrForDest: connect %#a failed errno %d (%s)", dst, errno, strerror(errno)); goto exit; }
74
75 if ((getsockname(sock, &addr.s, &len)) < 0)
76 { LogMsg("mDNSPlatformSourceAddrForDest: getsockname failed errno %d (%s)", errno, strerror(errno)); goto exit; }
77
78 src->type = dst->type;
79 if (dst->type == mDNSAddrType_IPv4) src->ip.v4.NotAnInteger = addr.a4.sin_addr.s_addr;
80 else src->ip.v6 = *(mDNSv6Addr*)&addr.a6.sin6_addr;
81exit:
82 close(sock);
83}
84
85// dst must be at least MAX_ESCAPED_DOMAIN_NAME bytes, and option must be less than 32 bytes in length
86mDNSlocal mDNSBool GetConfigOption(char *dst, const char *option, FILE *f)
87{
88 char buf[32+1+MAX_ESCAPED_DOMAIN_NAME]; // Option name, one space, option value
89 unsigned int len = strlen(option);
90 if (len + 1 + MAX_ESCAPED_DOMAIN_NAME > sizeof(buf)-1) { LogMsg("GetConfigOption: option %s too long", option); return mDNSfalse; }
91 fseek(f, 0, SEEK_SET); // set position to beginning of stream
92 while (fgets(buf, sizeof(buf), f)) // Read at most sizeof(buf)-1 bytes from file, and append '\0' C-string terminator
93 {
94 if (!strncmp(buf, option, len))
95 {
96 strncpy(dst, buf + len + 1, MAX_ESCAPED_DOMAIN_NAME-1);
97 if (dst[MAX_ESCAPED_DOMAIN_NAME-1]) dst[MAX_ESCAPED_DOMAIN_NAME-1] = '\0';
98 len = strlen(dst);
99 if (len && dst[len-1] == '\n') dst[len-1] = '\0'; // chop newline
100 return mDNStrue;
101 }
102 }
103 debugf("Option %s not set", option);
104 return mDNSfalse;
105}
106
107mDNSexport void ReadDDNSSettingsFromConfFile(mDNS *const m, const char *const filename, domainname *const hostname, domainname *const domain, mDNSBool *DomainDiscoveryDisabled)
108{
109 char buf[MAX_ESCAPED_DOMAIN_NAME] = "";
110 mStatus err;
111 FILE *f = fopen(filename, "r");
112
113 if (hostname) hostname->c[0] = 0;
114 if (domain) domain->c[0] = 0;
115 if (DomainDiscoveryDisabled) *DomainDiscoveryDisabled = mDNSfalse;
116
117 if (f)
118 {
119 if (DomainDiscoveryDisabled && GetConfigOption(buf, "DomainDiscoveryDisabled", f) && !strcasecmp(buf, "true")) *DomainDiscoveryDisabled = mDNStrue;
120 if (hostname && GetConfigOption(buf, "hostname", f) && !MakeDomainNameFromDNSNameString(hostname, buf)) goto badf;
121 if (domain && GetConfigOption(buf, "zone", f) && !MakeDomainNameFromDNSNameString(domain, buf)) goto badf;
122 buf[0] = 0;
123 GetConfigOption(buf, "secret-64", f); // failure means no authentication
124 fclose(f);
125 f = NULL;
126 }
127 else
128 {
129 if (errno != ENOENT) LogMsg("ERROR: Config file exists, but cannot be opened.");
130 return;
131 }
132
133 if (domain && domain->c[0] && buf[0])
134 {
135 DomainAuthInfo *info = (DomainAuthInfo*)mDNSPlatformMemAllocate(sizeof(*info));
136 // for now we assume keyname = service reg domain and we use same key for service and hostname registration
137 err = mDNS_SetSecretForDomain(m, info, domain, domain, buf, NULL, 0, mDNSfalse);
138 if (err) LogMsg("ERROR: mDNS_SetSecretForDomain returned %d for domain %##s", err, domain->c);
139 }
140
141 return;
142
143badf:
144 LogMsg("ERROR: malformatted config file");
145 if (f) fclose(f);
146}
147
148#if MDNS_DEBUGMSGS
149mDNSexport void mDNSPlatformWriteDebugMsg(const char *msg)
150{
151 fprintf(stderr,"%s\n", msg);
152 fflush(stderr);
153}
154#endif
155
156mDNSexport void mDNSPlatformWriteLogMsg(const char *ident, const char *buffer, mDNSLogLevel_t loglevel)
157{
158#if APPLE_OSX_mDNSResponder && LogTimeStamps
159 extern mDNS mDNSStorage;
160 extern mDNSu32 mDNSPlatformClockDivisor;
161 mDNSs32 t = mDNSStorage.timenow ? mDNSStorage.timenow : mDNSPlatformClockDivisor ? mDNS_TimeNow_NoLock(&mDNSStorage) : 0;
162 int ms = ((t < 0) ? -t : t) % 1000;
163#endif
164
165 if (mDNS_DebugMode) // In debug mode we write to stderr
166 {
167#if APPLE_OSX_mDNSResponder && LogTimeStamps
168 if (ident && ident[0] && mDNSPlatformClockDivisor)
169 fprintf(stderr,"%8d.%03d: %s\n", (int)(t/1000), ms, buffer);
170 else
171#endif
172 fprintf(stderr,"%s\n", buffer);
173 fflush(stderr);
174 }
175 else // else, in production mode, we write to syslog
176 {
177 static int log_inited = 0;
178
179 int syslog_level = LOG_ERR;
180 switch (loglevel)
181 {
182#if APPLE_OSX_mDNSResponder
183 case MDNS_LOG_MSG: syslog_level = OS_LOG_TYPE_DEFAULT; break;
184 case MDNS_LOG_OPERATION: syslog_level = OS_LOG_TYPE_INFO; break;
185 case MDNS_LOG_SPS: syslog_level = OS_LOG_TYPE_INFO; break;
186 case MDNS_LOG_INFO: syslog_level = OS_LOG_TYPE_INFO; break;
187 case MDNS_LOG_DEBUG: syslog_level = OS_LOG_TYPE_DEBUG; break;
188 default: syslog_level = OS_LOG_TYPE_DEFAULT; break;
189#else
190 case MDNS_LOG_MSG: syslog_level = LOG_ERR; break;
191 case MDNS_LOG_OPERATION: syslog_level = LOG_WARNING; break;
192 case MDNS_LOG_SPS: syslog_level = LOG_NOTICE; break;
193 case MDNS_LOG_INFO: syslog_level = LOG_INFO; break;
194 case MDNS_LOG_DEBUG: syslog_level = LOG_DEBUG; break;
195 default:
196 fprintf(stderr, "Unknown loglevel %d, assuming LOG_ERR\n", loglevel);
197 fflush(stderr);
198#endif
199 }
200
201 if (!log_inited) { openlog(ident, LOG_CONS, LOG_DAEMON); log_inited++; }
202
203#if APPLE_OSX_mDNSResponder && LogTimeStamps
204 if (ident && ident[0] && mDNSPlatformClockDivisor)
205 syslog(syslog_level, "%8d.%03d: %s", (int)(t/1000), ms, buffer);
206 else
207#endif
208 {
209#if APPLE_OSX_mDNSResponder
210 mDNSPlatformLogToFile(syslog_level, buffer);
211#else
212 syslog(syslog_level, "%s", buffer);
213#endif
214 }
215 }
216}
